sanskrit: कर्मण्येवाधिकारस्ते मा फलेषु कदाचन। मा कर्मफलहेतुर्भूर्मा ते सङ्गोऽस्त्वकर्मणि॥
transliteration: Karmanye vadhikaraste ma phaleshu kadachana, ma karmaphalahetur bhur ma te sango’stvakarmani.
meaning_hinglish: Tumhara adhikar keval karm karne mein hai, phalon mein kabhi nahi. Isliye karm ke phal ka kaaran mat ban aur karm na karne mein bhi asakti mat rakh.

sanskrit: देहिनोऽस्मिन्यथा देहे कौमारं यौवनं जरा। तथा देहान्तरप्राप्तिर्धीरस्तत्र न मुह्यति॥
transliteration: Dehino 'smin yatha dehe kaumaram yauvanam jara, tatha dehantara-praptir dhiras tatra na muhyati.
meaning_hinglish: Jaisey shareer mein bachpan, jawani aur budhapa aata hai, vaise hi atma ek shareer se doosre mein jaati hai. Samajhdaar vyakti ismein ghabrata nahi.

sanskrit: य एनं वेत्ति हन्तारं यश्चैनं मन्यते हतम्। उभौ तौ न विजानीतो नायं हन्ति न हन्यते॥
transliteration: Ya enam vetti hantaram yash chainam manyate hatam, ubhau tau na vijanito nayam hanti na hanyate.
meaning_hinglish: Jo is atma ko maarne wala ya mara gaya maanta hai, dono hi nahi jaante. Atma na kisi ko marta hai, na khud marta hai.

sanskrit: एवं प्रवर्तितं चक्रं नानुवर्तयतीह य:। अघायुरिन्द्रियारामो मोघं पार्थ स जीवति॥
transliteration: Evam pravartitam chakram nanuvartayatiha yah, aghayur indriyaramo mogham partha sa jivati.
meaning_hinglish: Jo vyakti prakriti ke is chakra ko nahi maanta, sirf indriyon ke sukh mein jeeta hai, uska jeevan vyarth hai.

sanskrit: श्रेयान्स्वधर्मो विगुण: परधर्मात्स्वनुष्ठितात्। स्वधर्मे निधनं श्रेय: परधर्मो भयावह:॥
transliteration: Shreyansvadharmo vigunah paradharmat svanushthitat, svadharme nidhanam shreyah paradharmo bhayavahah.
meaning_hinglish: Apne dharm mein mrityu bhi uttam hai, doosre ke dharm ka palan bhayankar hai.

sanskrit: यदा यदा हि धर्मस्य ग्लानिर्भवति भारत। अभ्युत्थानमधर्मस्य तदात्मानं सृजाम्यहम्॥
transliteration: Yada yada hi dharmasya glanir bhavati bharata, abhyutthanam adharmasya tadatmanam srijamyaham.
meaning_hinglish: Jab jab dharm ki hani hoti hai aur adharm badhta hai, tab tab main apna avataar leta hoon.

sanskrit: परित्राणाय साधूनां विनाशाय च दुष्कृताम्। धर्मसंस्थापनार्थाय सम्भवामि युगे युगे॥
transliteration: Paritranaya sadhunam vinashay cha dushkritam, dharma-samsthapanarthaya sambhavami yuge yuge.
meaning_hinglish: Main sadhu logon ki raksha, dushton ka vinash aur dharm ki sthapna ke liye har yug mein janm leta hoon.

transliteration: Chaturvarnyam maya srishtam guna-karma-vibhagashah.
meaning_hinglish: Mainne chaar varn ka vibhajan unke gun aur karm ke adhar par kiya hai.

sanskrit: विद्याविनयसम्पन्ने ब्राह्मणे गवि हस्तिनि। शुनि चैव श्वपाके च पण्डिता: समदर्शिन:॥
transliteration: Vidya-vinaya-sampanne brahmane gavi hastini, shuni chaiva shvapake cha panditah samadarshinah.
meaning_hinglish: Jo gyaani hota hai, wo sab mein ek hi atma ko dekhta hai — chahe brahman ho, gaay ho, haathi ho, ya kutta.

transliteration: Uddhared atmanatmanam natmanam avasadayet.
meaning_hinglish: Apne aap ko upar uthao, apne aap ka virodh mat karo. Atma hi apni mitra hai aur dushman bhi.

transliteration: Atmaiva hyatmano bandhur atmaiva ripur atmanah.
meaning_hinglish: Apna man hi apna sabse bada mitra hai aur apna shatru bhi wahi ho sakta hai.

sanskrit: यतो यतो निश्चरति मनश्चञ्चलमस्थिरम्। ततस्ततो नियम्यैतदात्मन्येव वशं नयेत्॥
transliteration: Yato yato nischalati manas chanchalam asthiram, tatas tato niyamyaitad atmany eva vasham nayet.
meaning_hinglish: Jahan jahan chanchal man bhatakta hai, wahan wahan se usse wapas laakar apne mein sthir karo.

transliteration: Mattah parataram nanyat kinchidasti dhananjaya.
meaning_hinglish: Hey Arjun! Mujhse upar kuch bhi nahi hai — sab kuch mujhse hi nikla hai.

sanskrit: अनन्याश्चिन्तयन्तो मां ये जनाः पर्युपासते। तेषां नित्याभियुक्तानां योगक्षेमं वहाम्यहम्॥
transliteration: Ananyas chintayanto mam ye janah paryupasate, tesham nityabhiyuktanam yogakshemam vahamyaham.
meaning_hinglish: Jo log sirf mujhe hi smaran karte hain, unki zaruratein main khud poori karta hoon.

transliteration: Aham atma gudakesha sarva-bhutasaya-sthitah.
meaning_hinglish: Hey Arjun! Main sabhi jeevon ke hriday mein sthit atma hoon.

transliteration: Kalosmi loka-ksaya-krit pravriddho.
meaning_hinglish: Main kaal hoon, jo sab kuch nasht karta hai.

sanskrit: अद्वेष्टा सर्वभूतानां मैत्र: करुण एव च।
transliteration: Adveshta sarvabhutanam maitrah karuna eva cha.
meaning_hinglish: Jo sab jeevon se dvesh na kare, mitra aur daya bhavna se bhara ho, wahi mujhe priya hai.

transliteration: Samam sarveshu bhuteshu tishthantam parameshwaram.
meaning_hinglish: Parmatma sabhi jeevon mein ek saman roop se sthit hai.

transliteration: Mamaivamsho jivaloke jivabhutah sanatanah.
meaning_hinglish: Jeev atma mera hi ansh hai — jo sanatan hai.

transliteration: Sarva-dharman parityajya mam ekam sharanam vraja.
meaning_hinglish: Sab kuch chhod kar meri sharan mein aa jao, main tumhe sab paapon se mukti dunga.

sanskrit: न जायते म्रियते वा कदाचिन् नायं भूत्वा भविता वा न भूय:।
transliteration: Na jayate mriyate va kadachin nayam bhutva bhavita va na bhuyah.
meaning_hinglish: Atma na kabhi janm leti hai, na hi kabhi marti hai.

sanskrit: वासांसि जीर्णानि यथा विहाय नवानि गृह्णाति नरोऽपराणि।
transliteration: Vasamsi jirnani yatha vihaya navani grhnati naro 'parani.
meaning_hinglish: Jaisey vyakti purane kapde chhodkar naye dharan karta hai, vaisey atma naye shareer leti hai.

transliteration: Yajñarthat karmano 'nyatra loko 'yam karmabandhanah.
meaning_hinglish: Yajna ke liye kiya gaya karm bandhan se mukti deta hai.

transliteration: Yadyad acharati shreshthas tattad evetaro janah.
meaning_hinglish: Jo kuch uttam vyakti karta hai, aam log uska anukaran karte hain.

sanskrit: जन्म कर्म च मे दिव्यमेवं यो वेत्ति तत्त्वत:।
transliteration: Janma karma cha me divyam evam yo vetti tattvatah.
meaning_hinglish: Jo mera janm aur karm divine samajhta hai, wo janm se mukti paata hai.

sanskrit: ब्रह्मण्याधाय कर्माणि सङ्गं त्यक्त्वा करोति य:।
transliteration: Brahmanyadhaya karmani sangam tyaktva karoti yah.
meaning_hinglish: Jo vyakti karm ko Ishwar mein samarpit kar deta hai, wo bandhan se mukta hota hai.

transliteration: Yogi yunjita satatam atmanam rahasi sthitah.
meaning_hinglish: Yogi hamesha ekant mein rahkar apne man ko sthir kare.

transliteration: Natyashnatas tu yogo 'sti na chaikantam anashnatah.
meaning_hinglish: Jo adhik khata hai ya bilkul nahi khata, uska yog safal nahi hota.

transliteration: Manushyanam sahasreshu kashchidyatati siddhaye.
meaning_hinglish: Hazaron mein koi ek siddhi prapt karne ka prayas karta hai.

transliteration: Anta-kale cha mam eva smaran muktva kalevaram.
meaning_hinglish: Jo ant samay mein mujhe yaad karta hai, wo moksha paata hai.

sanskrit: पत्रं पुष्पं फलं तोयं यो मे भक्त्या प्रयच्छति।
transliteration: Patram pushpam phalam toyam yo me bhaktya prayacchati.
meaning_hinglish: Jo bhakti se ek patta, phool, fal ya jal bhi arpit karta hai, main usse santusht hota hoon.

sanskrit: अहं सर्वस्य प्रभवो मत्त: सर्वं प्रवर्तते।
transliteration: Aham sarvasya prabhavo mattah sarvam pravartate.
meaning_hinglish: Main sabka utpatti sthal hoon, sab kuch mujhse hi nikalta hai.

transliteration: Aham atma gudakesha sarvabhutasaya-sthitah.
meaning_hinglish: Main sab jeevon ke hriday mein sthit hoon.

sanskrit: न तु मां शक्यसे द्रष्टुमनेनैव स्वचक्षुषा।
transliteration: Na tu mam shakyase drashtum anenaiva svachakshusha.
meaning_hinglish: Mujhe is mansi aankhon se nahi dekha ja sakta.

transliteration: Tasmattvam uttishtha yasho labhasva.
meaning_hinglish: Isliye khade ho jao Arjun! Aur yasha pao.

transliteration: Santushtah satatam yogi yatatma dridhanishchayah.
meaning_hinglish: Jo hamesha santusht, yog mein sthit, aur dridhnishchay wala ho — wo mujhe priya hai.

transliteration: Samam pashyan hi sarvatra samavasthitam Ishwaram.
meaning_hinglish: Jo sab mein ek hi Ishwar ko dekhta hai, wahi gyaani hai.

transliteration: Sattvam rajas tama iti gunah prakriti sambhavah.
meaning_hinglish: Sattva, rajas aur tamas — ye prakriti ke teen gun hain.

transliteration: Mam cha yo 'vyabhicharena bhakti-yogena sevate.
meaning_hinglish: Jo mujhe ananya bhakti se sevata hai, wo teenon gunon se upar uth jaata hai.

sanskrit: न तद्भासयते सूर्यो न शशाङ्को न पावक:।
transliteration: Na tad bhasayate suryo na shashanko na pavakah.
meaning_hinglish: Wo param dham aisa hai jise surya, chandrama ya agni roshan nahi kar sakte.
